Wow did not know you can use vars in there!
I did this a couple of weeks ago and ended up doing a replace on standard_header_includes
```{{ standard_header_includes|replace('<link rel="canonical" href="'~page_meta.canonical_url~'" />','<link rel="canonical" href="'~page_meta.canonical_url~'/'~dynamic_variable_here~'">') }}```
(this was just on a one off template)
Though I guess I also did a replace on the meta property which i donâ€™t know if the conical one does?
```|replace('<meta property="og:url" content="'~page_meta.canonical_url~'"/>','<meta property="og:url" content="'~page_meta.canonical_url~'/'~dynamic_variable_here~'">')```
